title: How to enable call recording on the Samsung Galaxy S22 series
content:
Android users had to rely on third-party apps to record phone calls for the longest time. But these days, almost all Android OEMs natively offer call recording support on their devices, including Samsung. If you’ve recently purchased a Galaxy S22 series device and you’re not sure how to set up call recording on it, you’ve

The post How to enable call recording on the Samsung Galaxy S22 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Just got yourself a new Samsung Galaxy S22 series device? Here's how you can enable automatic and manual call recording on it.
